"Xiera": "Some Dark Blast PAs have special extra effects. Let's find out about them now."
"In Buster Quests, <red>\"Punishment Knuckle\"<c> deals heavy damage to enemy weapons!"
"Task 3: <yellow>Charge Punishment Knuckle and strike the Devil Wall"
"Task 3: <yellow>Charge Punishment Knuckle and strike the Devil Wall"

"・Switch palettes with <%WeaponAction>
・Hold <%PhotonArts>, then release it"

"The Elder Form PA \"Punishment Knuckle\" gathers power and delivers a full-body punch straight ahead.

When charged, its power increases greatly, and it can destroy the \"Devil Walls\" that appear in Buster Quests in a single blow."
